decks.notes: This deck focuses on generating value through sacrificing creatures and artifacts to trigger various abilities, while also controlling the board with removal spells and powerful sorceries like Casualties of War. The key strategy is to create a loop with Cauldron Familiar, Witch's Oven, and Trail of Crumbs to gain incremental advantage and outvalue the opponent. Korvold, Fae-Cursed King serves as a powerful threat that can draw cards and grow in power. The deck aims to grind out the opponent through attrition and removal while creating a strong board presence.

The deck focuses on a fast-paced, aggressive strategy utilizing the Simic color combination. It aims to quickly develop a strong board presence with mana ramping cards like Growth Spiral and Nissa, Who Shakes the World, while also disrupting opponent's plays with counterspells like Negate and Sinister Sabotage. Key threats include Frilled Mystic and Nightpack Ambusher, with the potential for card advantage and lifegain from Hydroid Krasis. The deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a combination of tempo plays and powerful creatures, supported by a mana base that allows for flexibility and consistency.

This deck focuses on using powerful creatures and counterspells in a hybrid Simic aggro strategy. The deck aims to ramp up mana quickly with cards like Growth Spiral and Paradise Druid to play big threats like Nissa, Who Shakes the World and Hydroid Krasis. Counter spells like Negate and Sinister Sabotage protect your creatures and disrupt your opponent's game plan. Nightpack Ambusher and Frilled Mystic provide additional threats and utility, while Brazen Borrower offers tempo advantage. The land base is focused on ensuring consistent access to both green and blue mana sources.

The deck is focused on ramping up mana quickly to play powerful creatures and spells efficiently. It utilizes cards like Growth Spiral and Leafkin Druid to accelerate mana production, allowing for big plays like Nissa, Who Shakes the World and Hydroid Krasis. The deck also includes a small top-end with Finale of Devastation and End-Raze Forerunners for a potential game-ending finish. With a mix of ramp, card draw, and powerful threats, the deck aims to control the game and overwhelm the opponent with its late-game power.

The deck revolves around utilizing Fires of Invention to cast spells for free and control the opponent's board. The primary win condition is to use Cavalier of Flame's ability in combination with the Cavalier of Gales to deal damage to the opponent. Teferi, Time Raveler is used to control the opponent's spells and tempo, while Deafening Clarion helps to sweep the board of small creatures. The deck also includes card draw and manipulation in order to find the necessary pieces to dominate the game.

This deck focuses on using Simic cards to quickly establish board presence and overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures. It includes cards like Growth Spiral and Nissa, Who Shakes the World to ramp up mana, while also incorporating counterspells like Negate and Mystical Dispute for protection. The deck also features efficient creatures like Nightpack Ambusher and Hydroid Krasis to apply pressure on the opponent. Overall, the key concept of this deck is to play a fast and aggressive game, while controlling the board through counterspells and efficient threats.

This deck focuses on controlling the board through a combination of removal spells like Casualties of War and creatures with abilities that generate value such as Mayhem Devil and Korvold, Fae-Cursed King. It utilizes Witch's Oven and Cauldron Familiar to create a recurring source of damage while gaining advantage from Trail of Crumbs. The deck also includes cards like Wicked Wolf and Thrashing Brontodon to deal with threats on the opponent's side of the battlefield. The mana base is designed to ensure consistent access to all colors needed for the deck's powerful spells and abilities.

The deck focuses on playing aggressive creatures with efficient mana curves to pressure the opponent. It utilizes cards like Rotting Regisaur, Questing Beast, and Lovestruck Beast to quickly build a threatening board presence. The inclusion of cards like Vivien, Arkbow Ranger and The Great Henge provide additional value and card advantage to keep the pressure on. Foulmire Knight and Murderous Rider help deal with opposing threats, while Paradise Druid and Edgewall Innkeeper help ramp up mana and draw cards respectively. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with early aggression and powerful threats.

This Golgari Aggro deck focuses on a combination of aggressive creature plays and sacrificing permanents for value. By utilizing cards like Witch's Oven, Cauldron Familiar, and Trail of Crumbs, the deck aims to generate continuous advantage while pressuring opponents with creatures like Wicked Wolf and Midnight Reaper. The addition of powerful planeswalkers like Vraska, Golgari Queen and Massacre Girl, along with removal spells like Casualties of War and Murderous Rider, gives the deck flexibility and resilience against various strategies. The deck aims to control the board while applying pressure and draining opponents' resources.

The main idea of this deck is to control the game by countering opponent's spells and removing threats while ramping up mana with Wilderness Reclamation and Growth Spiral. It aims to outvalue the opponent through card advantage with Chemister's Insight and Niv-Mizzet, Parun, while also having burn spells like Scorching Dragonfire and Expansion / Explosion for reach. The deck also has some tempo plays with Brazen Borrower and disruption with Mystical Dispute. The mana base is focused on obtaining the right colors while also having flexibility with Fabled Passage and Castle Vantress.

The main focus of this Golgari Aggro deck is to consistently pressure the opponent with aggressive creatures and disruptive spells. The deck is built around utilizing efficient removal like Epic Downfall and Murderous Rider, while also generating card advantage with Edgewall Innkeeper and The Great Henge. The creatures in the deck are powerful and difficult to deal with, such as Questing Beast and Rotting Regisaur. The deck aims to control the board early on and transition into a strong mid-to-late game with cards like Vivien, Arkbow Ranger and Lovestruck Beast.

The deck focuses on using the Fires of Invention enchantment to cast spells for free, allowing the player to control the game by playing powerful threats such as Cavalier of Flame and Sphinx of Foresight while also having access to removal and board wipes like Deafening Clarion and Time Wipe. Teferi, Time Raveler helps to slow down the opponent's game plan, while Kenrith, the Returned King provides utility and flexibility. The deck aims to control the board and win through card advantage and powerful threats.

The focus of this UR Aggro deck is to control the board with counterspells and removal while building up a strong board presence with efficient creatures like Bonecrusher Giant, Brineborn Cutthroat, and Gadwick, the Wizened. Utilizing tempo plays with cards like Brazen Borrower and Ral's Outburst, the deck aims to pressure the opponent early on and maintain momentum throughout the game. The inclusion of versatile cards like Opt, Negate, and Ionize allows for adaptability in different matchups, making it a solid choice for aggressive players looking for a combination of control and aggression.

This deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly with cards like Growth Spiral and Fires of Invention to quickly cast powerful spells like Casualties of War and Golos, Tireless Pilgrim. The deck also utilizes control elements with Teferi, Time Raveler to disrupt the opponent's plans and cards like Time Wipe to reset the board if needed. The deck also includes a variety of lands to ensure all colors of mana can be produced efficiently. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with powerful spells and control elements while managing the board effectively.

The deck focuses on using adventure cards with additional effects from Lucky Clover to quickly overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures and removal spells. The key strategy is to generate value from adventure cards by doubling their effects with Lucky Clover, while maintaining a steady stream of threats to pressure the opponent. The deck also includes a balance of creatures and removal spells to maintain board control and disrupt the opponent's game plan. Additionally, the deck includes some card draw options to ensure that the player can continue to put pressure on the opponent.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game by utilizing powerful removal spells like Casualties of War and efficient creatures like Wicked Wolf and Korvold, Fae-Cursed King. By combining cards like Witch's Oven and Cauldron Familiar for recurring damage, along with Mayhem Devil for additional value, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy while generating card advantage through Trail of Crumbs and Midnight Reaper. With a mana base that supports all three colors effectively, the deck aims to outvalue and outlast the opponent in a long game.

The main focus of this deck is to control the board by utilizing powerful removal spells like Casualties of War and creatures like Mayhem Devil. The deck also includes cards like Witch's Oven and Cauldron Familiar for incremental advantage and Korvold, Fae-Cursed King as a win condition. The mana base is built around a Jund color combination to ensure consistency in casting spells. Overall, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while building up its own resources to secure victory in the late game.

This deck focuses on utilizing the Fires of Invention enchantment to play cards for free during the turn it's cast, allowing the player to control the board with powerful spells and creatures like Teferi, Time Raveler and Kenrith, the Returned King. The deck also includes removal spells like Justice Strike and Deafening Clarion to deal with threats, while using cards like Sphinx of Foresight and Cavalier of Flame to maintain card advantage and pressure the opponent. The mana base is designed to support a variety of colors for flexibility in casting spells.

This Sultai Control deck aims to establish control of the game through ramping with cards like Growth Spiral and Circuitous Route, while using powerful planeswalkers like Tamiyo and Nissa to generate card advantage and board presence. The deck also includes removal spells like Casualties of War and creatures like Massacre Girl to control the opponent's resources. Gadwick, the Wizened and Hydroid Krasis provide card draw and a strong late-game win condition. The deck focuses on mana ramp, card advantage, and removal to outvalue the opponent and win the game through incremental advantage.

The deck focuses on controlling the game through counterspells, removal, and card draw. It aims to stall the opponent's threats with cards like Dovin's Veto, Aether Gust, and Planar Cleansing, while using Teferi, Time Raveler to disrupt their strategy. Gadwick, the Wizened and Brazen Borrower provide additional card draw and tempo advantage. The deck also includes utility lands like Castle Ardenvale and Castle Vantress to generate tokens and scry. Overall, the strategy revolves around playing patiently, disrupting the opponent's game plan, and eventually winning through card advantage and powerful finishers like Finale of Revelation.

This deck focuses on utilizing a mix of aggressive creatures and instant spells to control the board and deal damage quickly to the opponent. With a strong mana base and a variety of counterspells and removal options, it aims to maintain tempo and pressure throughout the game. By efficiently using cards like Scorching Dragonfire and Bonecrusher Giant to answer threats and Brineborn Cutthroat and Gadwick, the Wizened to apply pressure, it aims to establish dominance early on and secure victories through a mix of direct damage and board control.

The main focus of this deck is to utilize the Fires of Invention enchantment to cast powerful spells for free each turn. By restricting the number of spells you can cast per turn to 2 (due to Fires of Invention's effect), you can control the board with powerful spells like Deafening Clarion and use high-impact creatures like Cavalier of Flame to quickly close out the game. Teferi, Time Raveler provides additional control and disruption, while the deck's consistency is improved through land filtering with cards like Shimmer of Possibility and Castle Vantress.

This deck focuses on utilizing a combination of removal spells, counterspells, and planeswalkers to control the game and disrupt the opponent's strategy. It aims to stabilize the board with cards like Oath of Kaya and Elite Guardmage, while generating card advantage with Narset, Parter of Veils and Teferi, Time Raveler. The inclusion of Bolas's Citadel and Kenrith, the Returned King provide alternative win conditions and additional utility. The mana base is designed to support the deck's three-color requirements, ensuring consistency in casting its spells.

The deck focuses on using Fires of Invention to cast powerful spells for free, while controlling the board with removal spells like Deafening Clarion and Time Wipe. Teferi, Time Raveler is used to disrupt opponents' strategies, while Cavalier of Flame and Kenrith, the Returned King provide additional threats. Fae of Wishes allows for access to a wide range of sideboard options, and the deck has a solid mana base with various Temples and shock lands to ensure consistency in casting spells.

The main focus of this deck is to utilize powerful ramp effects and card advantage to control the game and overwhelm the opponent with threats. By playing efficient mana dorks like Leafkin Druid and Arboreal Grazer, the deck aims to quickly ramp into powerful threats like Nissa, Who Shakes the World and Hydroid Krasis. Additionally, the deck includes powerful control elements like Castle Vantress and Finale of Devastation to disrupt the opponent's strategy and maintain board control. Overall, the deck aims to outvalue the opponent and win the game through a combination of ramp, control, and powerful threats.

This deck focuses on utilizing Fires of Invention to cast powerful spells for free, while controlling the board with cards like Deafening Clarion and Teferi, Time Raveler. The goal is to establish control of the game by limiting the opponent's options and overwhelming them with powerful creatures like Cavalier of Flame and Sphinx of Foresight. Kenrith, the Returned King provides additional utility and flexibility, while cards like Aether Gust and Justice Strike help deal with threats. The deck is designed to disrupt the opponent's game plan and quickly close out the game with big threats.

The deck focuses on utilizing the Fires of Invention enchantment to cast powerful spells for free, allowing the player to control the game by slowing down the opponent's strategy and taking control of the board. The deck includes cards like Teferi, Time Raveler and Cavalier of Flame to maintain board presence and disrupt the opponent's plays. By controlling the game tempo and using powerful spells like Time Wipe and Deafening Clarion, the deck aims to outlast the opponent and secure victory through careful resource management and strategic decision-making.

This deck focuses on quickly overwhelming opponents with aggressive creatures like Wicked Wolf and Midnight Reaper, supported by cards like Witch's Oven and Cauldron Familiar for consistent damage. The addition of removal spells like Murderous Rider and Casualties of War helps maintain board control. Vraska, Golgari Queen and Bolas's Citadel provide additional value and potential game-ending threats. The deck also incorporates card advantage with Trail of Crumbs and Massacre Girl to outvalue opponents. Castle Locthwain and Temple of Malady provide additional card draw and mana fixing in this Golgari Aggro build.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game using the Fires of Invention enchantment to cast spells without needing to pay their mana cost. The deck includes powerful control cards like Teferi, Time Raveler and Deafening Clarion to keep the opponent's board in check. The deck also incorporates card draw and selection with cards like Shimmer of Possibility and Drawn from Dreams to ensure consistent access to key cards. The win condition is to overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures like Cavalier of Flame and Kenrith, the Returned King while maintaining control of the game.

This Jund Control deck focuses on generating value through sacrificing creatures and permanents to trigger powerful effects. The key strategy involves using cards like Witch's Oven, Cauldron Familiar, and Mayhem Devil to create a loop of sacrificing and dealing damage to the opponent. Casualties of War provides additional removal and disruption, while cards like Trail of Crumbs and Midnight Reaper help to draw cards and maintain card advantage. The deck also includes powerful threats like Korvold, Fae-Cursed King and Vraska, Golgari Queen to close out games.

The main goal of this deck is to gain control of the board by utilizing various removal spells and powerful creatures. The deck focuses on generating value through sacrificing and recurring creatures, triggering abilities like Mayhem Devil and Cauldron Familiar to control the opponent's board while generating advantage. By using cards like Casualties of War and Massacre Girl, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan and take control of the battlefield. The deck also employs a strong mana ramp strategy with cards like Paradise Druid and Gilded Goose to ensure consistent land drops and casting of powerful spells.

The deck focuses on utilizing sacrifice effects to gain incremental value and control the board. By repeatedly sacrificing creatures like Cauldron Familiar and Food tokens generated by cards like Witch's Oven and Gilded Goose, players can trigger abilities like Trail of Crumbs and Mayhem Devil to grind out advantages over opponents. Korvold, Fae-Cursed King serves as a powerful finisher, growing in strength with each sacrifice made. Overall, the deck aims to outvalue and outlast opponents through a combination of card advantage and synergy between sacrifice effects.

The main concept of this Jund Control deck is to establish board control through the use of removal spells and sacrifice effects. By utilizing cards like Witch's Oven, Mayhem Devil, and Trail of Crumbs, the deck can generate value through sacrificing creatures and triggering effects. Additionally, the deck includes powerful threats like Garruk, Cursed Huntsman and Korvold, Fae-Cursed King to close out the game. The combination of removal, sacrifice synergies, and strong threats allows the deck to outvalue opponents and control the game to secure victory.

The primary focus of this deck is to aggressively use sacrifice and burn effects to control the board and chip away at the opponent's life total. Utilizing cards like Witch's Oven, Cauldron Familiar, Mayhem Devil, and Priest of Forgotten Gods, the deck aims to generate value from sacrificing creatures and dealing incremental damage. With the addition of Chandra, Acolyte of Flame and Angrath's Rampage, the deck has versatile removal options to clear the way for the aggressive Rakdos creatures like Gutterbones and Cavalier of Night to push through for the win.

This deck utilizes the Adventure mechanic to efficiently play multiple spells in a turn, generating card advantage and tempo. The key strategy is to use Lucky Clover to double the value of adventures, while utilizing ramp spells like Growth Spiral and Beanstalk Giant to accelerate mana development. Brazen Borrower and Bonecrusher Giant provide tempo by disrupting the opponent's game plan, while Hydroid Krasis offers a powerful threat and card draw engine. Fae of Wishes serves as a versatile toolbox, allowing access to a wide range of answers and threats from the sideboard.

The deck focuses on controlling the game by countering opponents' spells and removing threats with cards like Negate, Mystical Dispute, and Flame Sweep. It aims to generate card advantage and mana advantage with cards like Chemister's Insight, Wilderness Reclamation, and Growth Spiral. The deck also includes versatile cards like Expansion / Explosion and Brazen Borrower for flexibility in different situations. The mana base is optimized to ensure consistent color availability and tempo. Overall, the deck's strategy is to out-value and outlast opponents in a long game.

The main concept of this deck is to maximize card advantage and control the game using Fires of Invention. By casting spells for free with Fires of Invention, the deck can efficiently ramp with Growth Spiral and Escape to the Wilds, disrupt opponents with Teferi, Time Raveler, and answer threats with Casualties of War. The deck includes versatile threats like Niv-Mizzet Reborn and Hydroid Krasis for card draw and flexibility. The mana base is built to support a variety of colors, allowing the deck to cast a wide range of spells and adapt to different situations.

The main concept of this Golgari Aggro deck is to quickly build a board presence using efficient creatures like Cauldron Familiar and Gilded Goose, while utilizing cards like Witch's Oven to generate value and maintain card advantage. Trail of Crumbs helps to dig for more threats and Casualties of War acts as a powerful late-game removal spell. Vraska, Golgari Queen provides additional removal and card advantage, creating a versatile and aggressive deck that can apply pressure and disrupt opponents.

The primary focus of this Golgari Control deck is to maintain board control through a combination of removal spells, recurring creatures, and value-generating engines. Utilizing cards like Vraska, Golgari Queen and Casualties of War for removal, along with synergistic cards like Witch's Oven, Trail of Crumbs, and Cauldron Familiar for value generation, the deck aims to outlast opponents and grind out victories. Additionally, cards like Midnight Reaper and Massacre Girl provide additional card draw and board sweep capabilities, while creatures like Wicked Wolf and Thrashing Brontodon help maintain board presence and disrupt the opponent's strategy.

The main idea of this deck is to quickly apply pressure on the opponent by playing aggressive creatures like Brazen Borrower, Bonecrusher Giant, Brineborn Cutthroat, and Gadwick, the Wizened. Control the board with counterspells like Negate, Quench, and Ionize, while also dealing direct damage with cards like Scorching Dragonfire and Ral's Outburst. Use card draw and selection spells like Opt to maintain consistency and tempo. The deck aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent with threats and disrupt their game plan, using a combination of aggression and control elements.

The main strategy of this deck revolves around using Fires of Invention to cast powerful spells for free each turn, while controlling the board with cards like Deafening Clarion and Teferi, Time Raveler. The deck also includes powerful finishers like Kenrith, the Returned King and Cavalier of Flame to close out the game. It focuses on setting up a strong defense with removal spells and card draw, while efficiently using mana to deploy threats and disrupt the opponent's game plan.

This deck focuses on using Fires of Invention to cast spells for free and control the game by wiping the board with Time Wipe or dealing damage with Cavalier of Flame. Teferi, Time Raveler is used to disrupt the opponent's plans, while Sphinx of Foresight and Shimmer of Possibility help to dig for key cards. The deck also includes a mix of removal spells and powerful creatures like Kenrith, the Returned King and Cavalier of Gales to maintain board presence and pressure the opponent. The mana base is designed to support a consistent and flexible gameplay.

This deck focuses on utilizing the Fires of Inventions enchantment to cast powerful spells for free. By controlling the board with cards like Deafening Clarion and Prison Realm, the deck aims to protect its key pieces such as Teferi, Time Raveler and the Cavalier creatures. The deck also includes card draw and manipulation spells like Shimmer of Possibility and Sphinx of Foresight to ensure consistency in draws. Kenrith, the Returned King provides additional utility while the mana base is carefully crafted to support the multicolored spells in the deck.

The main focus of this deck is to control the board by utilizing sacrifice synergies with Cauldron Familiar, Witch's Oven, and Mayhem Devil. This allows the player to gain incremental advantages over their opponent while generating card advantage through Trail of Crumbs and Midnight Reaper. The deck also features powerful removal spells like Casualties of War and Thrashing Brontodon to deal with threats on the opponent's side of the board. Additionally, the deck can generate mana ramp with Gilded Goose and Paradise Druid to cast powerful threats like Korvold, Fae-Cursed King.

The core focus of this deck is to apply constant pressure on the opponent by sacrificing creatures to create value through effects like Mayhem Devil and Priest of Forgotten Gods. By using cards like Claim the Firstborn and Angrath's Rampage to disrupt the opponent's board, backed up by the card advantage provided by Midnight Reaper and Rankle, Master of Pranks, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent quickly and efficiently. The synergy between sacrificing creatures and recurring them from the graveyard with cards like Witch's Oven and Gutterbones is crucial to the deck's success.

This deck focuses on maintaining board control and generating value through the Adventure mechanic. By utilizing cards like Lucky Clover and Edgewall Innkeeper, the deck can consistently produce extra card advantage and mana efficiency. The deck also includes strong removal options with cards like Casualties of War and Murderous Rider. The end goal is to outvalue the opponent by efficiently utilizing Adventure cards, generating tokens with Lovestruck Beast, and ultimately overwhelming the opponent with powerful threats like Beanstalk Giant and Vraska, Golgari Queen.

The main goal of this Golgari Aggro deck is to maintain board presence and pressure the opponent with efficient creatures and removal spells. The deck focuses on aggression and board control with efficient creatures like Questing Beast and Lovestruck Beast, along with removal options like Murderous Rider. The inclusion of cards like Liliana, Dreadhorde General and Garruk, Cursed Huntsman provide extra value and card advantage. The deck's mana base is designed to provide consistency and flexibility in casting spells, ensuring that the aggressive strategy can be executed effectively.

This Golgari Aggro deck focuses on utilizing a combination of powerful creatures and removal spells to maintain board control and pressure the opponent. By relying on creatures like Lovestruck Beast, Questing Beast, and Murderous Rider, along with support from cards like Vivien, Arkbow Ranger and Casualties of War, the deck aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent and disrupt their strategy. With a mix of aggressive creatures and versatile removal options, the deck seeks to establish dominance early in the game and maintain pressure until victory is achieved.

This deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with aggressive spells and creatures in order to deal damage as efficiently as possible. The key idea here is to control the game while maintaining a steady stream of threats and pressure. By utilizing a mix of counter spells, burn spells, and evasive creatures, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while dealing damage consistently. The inclusion of powerful finishers like Niv-Mizzet, Parun and God-Eternal Kefnet ensures that the deck has the tools to close out games decisively.

The focus of this deck is to quickly play aggressive creatures and counter opponent's spells while dealing direct damage. Using efficient tempo plays and card advantage, the deck aims to control the board and apply pressure to the opponent. With a mixture of cheap spells, counterspells, and powerful creatures, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan and close out the game before they can stabilize. The deck also includes some card draw and scrying effects to maintain a steady flow of resources.

The main focus of this Simic Aggro deck is to quickly establish a board presence and apply pressure to the opponent. By utilizing efficient creatures like Brineborn Cutthroat, Brazen Borrower, and Nightpack Ambusher, along with disruptive spells like Mystical Dispute and Quench, this deck aims to control the game while also developing its mana base with cards like Growth Spiral and Nissa, Who Shakes the World. The deck also includes versatile counterspells like Sinister Sabotage and Frilled Mystic to protect its threats and maintain tempo throughout the match.

This deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly to play powerful creatures and spells that control the board. It utilizes cards like Growth Spiral and Circuitous Route to accelerate land drops, while also running removal spells like Casualties of War and creatures like Massacre Girl to efficiently deal with opponent's threats. The deck's win condition comes from playing powerful finishers like Nissa, Who Shakes the World and Hydroid Krasis to overwhelm the opponent. It aims to outvalue and outlast the opponent through a combination of ramp, control, and threats.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game by ramping up mana with cards like Growth Spiral and Wilderness Reclamation, allowing for powerful plays like Expansion/Explosion and Escape to the Wilds. It also utilizes counter spells like Frilled Mystic and card advantage engines like Chemister's Insight to maintain control of the board. Niv-Mizzet, Parun serves as a win condition while cards like Flame Sweep and Bonecrusher Giant help to deal with opposing threats. Overall, the deck aims to outvalue and outlast opponents through efficient control tactics and powerful spells.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game through countermagic, board wipes, and card advantage while slowly building towards a win condition. It utilizes a combination of counterspells like Dovin's Veto and Absorb, along with removal spells such as Planar Cleansing and Time Wipe to keep the opponent's board in check. Teferi, Time Raveler provides additional control and disruption, while Gadwick, the Wizened and Brazen Borrower offer card draw and tempo advantage. The deck aims to outlast opponents through attrition and establish a dominant board presence with powerful finishers like Finale of Revelation.

This UW Control deck focuses on maintaining control of the game through counterspells and board wipes while using Teferi, Time Raveler to disrupt the opponent's strategy. The deck also includes Brazen Borrower for tempo plays and Mass Manipulation and Agent of Treachery for stealing the opponent's best threats. The mana base is designed to consistently hit the deck's heavy blue and white mana requirements, while Castle Vantress and Castle Ardenvale provide additional utility. The deck aims to stall the game until it can establish overwhelming card advantage and board control to secure victory.

The focus of this deck is to maintain a strong board presence through a combination of creature removal, card advantage, and recurring threats. By utilizing cards like Trail of Crumbs and Witch's Oven to generate value and protect key creatures like Cauldron Familiar and Wicked Wolf, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a steady stream of threats. With a mix of removal spells like Casualties of War and Murderous Rider, along with powerful finishers like Vraska, Golgari Queen and Massacre Girl, this deck looks to apply constant pressure and grind out victories.

The deck focuses on exploiting the Fires of Invention mechanic to cast spells for free and control the game. It includes a mix of board wipes, removal spells, and powerful creatures like Teferi, Time Raveler and Kenrith, the Returned King to maintain board control and outvalue the opponent. The Fae of Wishes serves as a versatile toolbox, while the Cavaliers provide strong threats and card advantage. The deck aims to stall the game until it can establish a dominant board presence and overwhelm the opponent.

This aggressive deck relies on quickly playing creatures and utilizing adventures for value. By doubling up on adventure triggers with Lucky Clover, the deck can generate a lot of tempo and card advantage. Casualties of War provides a powerful payoff for reaching the late game, while cards like Murderous Rider and Midnight Reaper help maintain card advantage and board presence. The deck aims to overwhelm opponents with its efficient creatures and removal spells, taking advantage of the synergy between adventures and the knight subtheme.

The deck focuses on quickly developing a board presence through the Adventure mechanic, utilizing cards like Lucky Clover to double the value of adventure spells. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures like Smitten Swordmaster and Lovestruck Beast, while also maintaining card advantage with Midnight Reaper and Edgewall Innkeeper. Casualties of War provides a powerful late-game finisher, allowing the deck to deal with threats and swing the game in its favor. The mana base is built to support both the green and black spells in the deck.

This Golgari Aggro deck focuses on a combination of aggressive creatures and powerful removal spells to control the board and apply pressure on the opponent. The deck utilizes cards like Cauldron Familiar and Witch's Oven for repeated damage, while also running cards like Casualties of War and Murderous Rider for removal and disruption. The deck aims to establish a strong board presence early on and maintain control of the game through a mix of efficient creatures and versatile spells.

The core strategy of this Golgari Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures and disruptive spells. This deck aims to quickly establish a strong board presence using cards like Gilded Goose and Paradise Druid, while also utilizing Trail of Crumbs and Witch's Oven for card advantage and recurring threats. The deck also includes powerful removal spells such as Casualties of War and Murderous Rider to deal with opposing threats. Overall, the Golgari Aggro deck aims to apply constant pressure and control the field to come out victorious in a Standard 1 vs 1 match.

This Gruul Aggro deck focuses on consistently putting pressure on the opponent with aggressive creatures like Gruul Spellbreaker, Questing Beast, and Lovestruck Beast. The deck also includes efficient removal with cards like Domri's Ambush and Bonecrusher Giant. The deck aims to quickly build a board presence and close out the game with powerful finishers like Embercleave. Additionally, the inclusion of cards like Rimrock Knight and Edgewall Innkeeper help maintain card advantage and tempo. The mana base is optimized for consistency and allows for easy access to both red and green mana sources.

The deck focuses on leveraging the Fires of Invention enchantment to play multiple high-impact spells each turn without using mana. It aims to control the board with removal spells like Assassin's Trophy and Cry of the Carnarium, while also generating card advantage with Bond of Flourishing. The deck can sweep the board with Casualties of War and hit hard with aggressive creatures like Questing Beast and Cavalier of Flame. The strategy is to overwhelm the opponent with powerful spells and creatures while dominating the battlefield.

The focus of this deck is to establish board control and card advantage through the use of Fires of Invention allowing you to cast spells for free. Utilizing cards like Covetous Urge and Stormfist Crusader to disrupt your opponent's hand and draw more cards for yourself. The synergy between Witch's Oven, Cauldron Familiar, and Mayhem Devil provides consistent damage and life gain. Cavalier of Flame and God-Eternal Bontu offer powerful threats and additional card draw. With a mix of removal, sacrifice outlets, and card advantage engines, this deck aims to outvalue and outlast your opponent.

The main idea of this deck is to aggressively take control of the opponent's creatures and resources by using cards like Claim the Firstborn and Witch's Oven to sacrifice and steal creatures, while also dealing damage with cards like Mayhem Devil and Rankle, Master of Pranks. The goal is to constantly apply pressure and force the opponent to react to your board presence, ultimately overwhelming them and securing victory in a fast-paced, aggressive manner.

Utilizing a combination of powerful ramp, card draw, and control elements, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents with big threats while simultaneously disrupting their game plan. By using cards like Nissa, Who Shakes the World and Hydroid Krasis to generate massive amounts of mana and card advantage, as well as cards like Agent of Treachery and Mass Manipulation to steal or remove key threats, this deck can outvalue and outlast opponents through a combination of resource management and tempo plays.
